abstract: Serena Williams withdraws from opening match at Hopman Cup mixed team tennis tournament with knee inflammation; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Serena Williams was ruled out of her opening match at the Hopman Cup mixed team event in Perth, Australia, on Monday because of knee inflammation, organizers said.
snippet: Top-ranked Serena Williams was ruled out of her opening match at the Hopman Cup mixed team event in Perth, Australia, on Monday because of knee inflammation, organizers said....
